ack.p: We would like to thank the members of the Rocky Mountain Veterinary Branch (Division of Intramural Research [DIR], National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases [NIAID], NIH) for their assistance with this study, Anita Mora (DIR, NIAID, NIH) for help with figure design, and Danielle Porter (Gilead Sciences) for manuscript help. This work was supported by the Intramural Research Program of NIAID, NIH, and federal funds from the Biomedical Advanced Research and Development Authority, Office of the Assistant Secretary for Preparedness and Response, Department of Health and Human Services.
